segments.text: Tom , how do you think of second-hand goods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why did you ask that ? Do you want to buy the used goods ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm considering buying a second-hand computer for I'm short of money now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know the car I'm driving , which is still in good condition though it is second-hand . And it only cost me 300 dollars . It was so cheap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But do you really mean that the second - hand goods are just as good as the new ones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends . So you must be careful buying second-hand goods .
segments.speaker: S2
